title: test wordpress card
text:
Styles for https://hack.chat/
body{
    background:url(https://media.tenor.com/VMNUYdNQwCkAAAAd/cyber-punk-cyberpunk2077.gif) center/cover no-repeat fixed!important;
    padding-bottom:68px!important;
    margin-bottom:0!important
}
#footer{
    background:transparent!important
}
#sidebar{
    background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85)!important
}
.container{
    max-width:800px!important
}
.text{
    margin-left:0
}
img{
    max-width:300px;
    max-height:800px
}
article.container{
    background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85);
    min-height:100vh
}
.nick {
    display: flex!important;
    justify-content: end;
}
.nick > * {
    background: #fff;
    margin-left: .2rem;
    padding: .2rem .5rem .15rem .6rem;
}
.messages{
    padding:1rem
}
.message{
    border-left:none!important;
    padding-bottom:.5rem
}
.message>p:empty {
    display:none
}
.message>p.text>*:not(hr),
.message>p:not(.text):not(:empty) {
    display:block;
    margin:0 0 .5rem .5rem!important;
    font-size:1rem;
    background:#fff;
    color:#000;
    padding:.5rem;
    border-radius:.25rem;
    width: fit-content;
    max-width:95%
}
.message.info>p.text>*,
.message.info>p:not(.text):not(:empty) {
    background:#87cefa
}
.message.info>p.text>hr {
    border-color:#87cefa
}
.message.warn>p.text>*,
.message.warn>p:not(.text):not(:empty) {
    background:bisque
}
.message.warn>p.text>hr {
    border-color:bisque
}
#chatinput {
    background:#fff;
    color:#000;
    padding:.5rem;
    width:783px!important;
    box-sizing:content-box
}
blockquote{
    border-left:.5rem solid royalblue
}
Minified by https://www.toptal.com/developers/cssminifier
body{background:url(https://media.tenor.com/VMNUYdNQwCkAAAAd/cyber-punk-cyberpunk2077.gif) center/cover no-repeat fixed!important;padding-bottom:68px!important;margin-bottom:0!important}#footer{background:0 0!important}#sidebar{background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85)!important}.container{max-width:800px!important}.text{margin-left:0}img{max-width:300px;max-height:800px}article.container{background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85);min-height:100vh}.nick{display:flex!important;justify-content:end}.nick>*{background:#fff;margin-left:.2rem;padding:.2rem .5rem .15rem .6rem}.messages{padding:1rem}.message{border-left:none!important;padding-bottom:.5rem}.message>p:empty{display:none}.message>p.text>:not(hr),.message>p:not(.text):not(:empty){display:block;margin:0 0 .5rem .5rem!important;font-size:1rem;background:#fff;color:#000;padding:.5rem;border-radius:.25rem;width:fit-content;max-width:95%}.message.info>p.text>*,.message.info>p:not(.text):not(:empty){background:#87cefa}.message.info>p.text>hr{border-color:#87cefa}.message.warn>p.text>*,.message.warn>p:not(.text):not(:empty){background:bisque}.message.warn>p.text>hr{border-color:bisque}#chatinput{background:#fff;color:#000;padding:.5rem;width:783px!important;box-sizing:content-box}blockquote{border-left:.5rem solid #4169e1}
JS
window.hack = {
    send: function() {
        const text = document.getElementById("chatinput").value;
        document.getElementById("chatinput").value = "";
        return send({"cmd":"chat","text":text});
    },
    set: function() {
        const input = document.getElementById("chatinput");
        const elClone = input.cloneNode(true);
        input.parentNode.replaceChild(elClone, input);/* remove keypress listener */
        document.getElementById("send")?.remove();
        document.getElementById("chatform").innerHTML+="<button id='send' style='position:absolute;padding: 1rem 2rem;margin:.15rem 0 0 .2rem;'>send</button>"
        document.getElementById("send").addEventListener("click", function(event){event.preventDefault();hack.send();});
        document.querySelector("head>style")?.remove();
        document.head.innerHTML+="<style>"+this.css+"</style>";
    },
    css: "body{background:url(https://media.tenor.com/VMNUYdNQwCkAAAAd/cyber-punk-cyberpunk2077.gif) center/cover no-repeat fixed!important;padding-bottom:68px!important;margin-bottom:0!important}#footer{background:0 0!important}#sidebar{background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85)!important}.container{max-width:800px!important}.text{margin-left:0}img{max-width:300px;max-height:800px}article.container{background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85);min-height:100vh}.nick{display:flex!important;justify-content:end}.nick>*{background:#fff;margin-left:.2rem;padding:.2rem .5rem .15rem .6rem}.messages{padding:1rem}.message{border-left:none!important;padding-bottom:.5rem}.message>p:empty{display:none}.message>p.text>:not(hr),.message>p:not(.text):not(:empty){display:block;margin:0 0 .5rem .5rem!important;font-size:1rem;background:#fff;color:#000;padding:.5rem;border-radius:.25rem;width:fit-content;max-width:95%}.message.info>p.text>*,.message.info>p:not(.text):not(:empty){background:#87cefa}.message.info>p.text>hr{border-color:#87cefa}.message.warn>p.text>*,.message.warn>p:not(.text):not(:empty){background:bisque}.message.warn>p.text>hr{border-color:bisque}#chatinput{background:#fff;color:#000;padding:.5rem;width:783px!important;box-sizing:content-box}blockquote{border-left:.5rem solid #4169e1}"
};
JS Minified by https://codebeautify.org/minify-js
window.hack={send:function(){const e=document.getElementById("chatinput").value;return document.getElementById("chatinput").value="",send({cmd:"chat",text:e})},set:function(){const e=document.getElementById("chatinput"),t=e.cloneNode(!0);e.parentNode.replaceChild(t,e),document.getElementById("send")?.remove(),document.getElementById("chatform").innerHTML+="<button id='send' style='position:absolute;padding: 1rem 2rem;margin:.15rem 0 0 .2rem;'>send</button>",document.getElementById("send").addEventListener("click",(function(e){e.preventDefault(),hack.send()})),document.querySelector("head>style")?.remove(),document.head.innerHTML+="<style>"+this.css+"</style>"},css:"body{background:url(https://media.tenor.com/VMNUYdNQwCkAAAAd/cyber-punk-cyberpunk2077.gif) center/cover no-repeat fixed!important;padding-bottom:68px!important;margin-bottom:0!important}#footer{background:0 0!important}#sidebar{background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85)!important}.container{max-width:800px!important}.text{margin-left:0}img{max-width:300px;max-height:800px}article.container{background-color:rgba(0,25,53,.85);min-height:100vh}.nick{display:flex!important;justify-content:end}.nick>*{background:#fff;margin-left:.2rem;padding:.2rem .5rem .15rem .6rem}.messages{padding:1rem}.message{border-left:none!important;padding-bottom:.5rem}.message>p:empty{display:none}.message>p.text>:not(hr),.message>p:not(.text):not(:empty){display:block;margin:0 0 .5rem .5rem!important;font-size:1rem;background:#fff;color:#000;padding:.5rem;border-radius:.25rem;width:fit-content;max-width:95%}.message.info>p.text>*,.message.info>p:not(.text):not(:empty){background:#87cefa}.message.info>p.text>hr{border-color:#87cefa}.message.warn>p.text>*,.message.warn>p:not(.text):not(:empty){background:bisque}.message.warn>p.text>hr{border-color:bisque}#chatinput{background:#fff;color:#000;padding:.5rem;width:783px!important;box-sizing:content-box}blockquote{border-left:.5rem solid #4169e1}"};
